bug.author: ming71
bug.description:
In the training phase , GPU-Utility is able to reach 94% , but declines to 17% when test/eval . What's wrong with my training? Train: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/43720092/69229194-f547bd80-0bbf-11ea-9569-0b8bfe3f999c.png></denchmark-link>
Eval: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/43720092/69229146-d812ef00-0bbf-11ea-9956-01382e264c3d.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Nothing is wrong, this is normal. NMS during testing takes time.
